name: T RUTH T RUST T RUMP
description: What happens when you separate T from the TRUTH, T from TRUST, T from TRUMP? You try to separate the TRUTH and RUTH (Bader-Ginsberg) will always be there in spirit. You remove the TRUST and you get RUST. Without trust in our social/political/economic systems in our society...the fabric of our fellowship begins to flounder and fall apart. And of course, who can forget the ever present, low hanging fruit of a "President" Trump? Let's remove the T from his name and ahhhh yes...we're left with just his RUMP.
